name: Bass Run
description:
This is the game I made in one of my YouTube videos.

So, Davie 504, my one of the favourite YouTubers, is soon about to hit 10 million subscribers. To celebrate this grand milestone, I made a game just for him. So, play as Davie504, in this infinite runner game and try to top the leaderboards. Remember, it won't be easy.

How to Play:

Though I have a How To Play page in the game but still let's kill some of your time.

Left click or Space - Jump

Right click or Shift - Fall instantly

And that's about it.
